content:
[ ] Zip files
[ ] .feature can be downloaded alongside with the .apps and encoded after download (download-upload APIs), or downloaded on the app itself. These are signed by app
[ ] .extension is for 3rd-party features, working like a .feature but with security warnings
[ ] .fll are libraries that can be used by system or other apps - but .feature can also be used by other apps
title: 1 .feature, .extension and .fll
